meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Becky Powell Rich Clarey Ben Bass Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4068.

td.p: Becky Powell, a graduate student from Knoxville, Tennessee
Rich Clarey, a film student originally from Petaluma, California
Ben Bass, an attorney from Chicago, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $35,200)

tr.td: NURSERY RHYME WOMEN
TV MOVIES
FOOD, GLORIOUS FOOD
VISIBLE BODY PARTS
"OO" 7-LETTER WORDS
BONDS, COMMON BONDS

Rich

AGAINST THE "WALL"
